body_html:
@skye i refer https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.2/tensorflow/contrib/cmake, dependencies included.
However, i exec tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_build.sh CMAKE tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/cmake.sh for building tensorflow, output logs as follow,

[root@localhost tensorflow]# tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_build.sh CMAKE tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/cmake.sh
WORKSPACE: /home/loongson/tensorflow
CI_DOCKER_EXTRA_PARAMS: 
COMMAND: tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/cmake.sh
CI_COMMAND_PREFIX: 
CONTAINER_TYPE: cmake
BUILD_TAG: tf_ci
  (docker container name will be tf_ci.cmake)

Building container (tf_ci.cmake)...
Sending build context to Docker daemon 304.1 kB
Step 1 : FROM ubuntu:16.04
Trying to pull repository docker.io/library/ubuntu ... 
sha256:382452f82a8bbd34443b2c727650af46aced0f94a44463c62a9848133ecb1aa8: Pulling from docker.io/library/ubuntu
b6f892c0043b: Pull complete 
55010f332b04: Pull complete 
2955fb827c94: Pull complete 
3deef3fcbd30: Pull complete 
cf9722e506aa: Pull complete 
Digest: sha256:382452f82a8bbd34443b2c727650af46aced0f94a44463c62a9848133ecb1aa8
Status: Downloaded newer image for docker.io/ubuntu:16.04
 ---> ebcd9d4fca80
Step 2 : MAINTAINER Shanqing Cai 
 ---> Running in 5539f888554c
 ---> b47c31a23a17
Removing intermediate container 5539f888554c
Step 3 : COPY install/*.sh /install/
 ---> 1c16e7a094c4
Removing intermediate container 555cd53000c4
Step 4 : RUN /install/install_bootstrap_deb_packages.sh
 ---> Running in ddd33994a3bf
panic: standard_init_linux.go:175: exec user process caused "exec format error" [recovered]
	panic: standard_init_linux.go:175: exec user process caused "exec format error"

goroutine 1 [running, locked to thread]:
panic(0x1203d0060, 0xc420149ea0)
	/usr/lib/golang/src/runtime/panic.go:500 +0x4c4
... ...

As we knows, docker is used for testing, but our os is fedora not ubuntu. It occur error. I try to modify Dockerfile or shut down the docker test. Could you give me some ideas ?

body:
@skye i refer [https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.2/tensorflow/contrib/cmake](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.2/tensorflow/contrib/cmake), dependencies included. However, i exec `tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_build.sh CMAKE tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/cmake.sh` for building tensorflow, output logs as follow, 
[root@localhost tensorflow]# tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_build.sh CMAKE tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/cmake.sh
